question: What familial relation does the former NFL player who designed his team's logo in the 1940s bear to the outfielder selected 23rd overall in the 2010 MLB Draft?
llm_answer: The former NFL player who designed his team’s logo in the 1940s—Fred Gehrke—is the great-grandfather of the outfielder selected 23rd overall in the 2010 MLB Draft, Christian Yelich.
